attributes.action: Legalise Cannabis recreationally for sale and consumption
attributes.additional_details: Legalization will ensure safe, high-quality products, generate significant tax revenue, reduce illegal trade, and provide medical relief for patients. Unlike decriminalization, regulated legalization guarantees consumer safety, supports economic growth, and promotes social unity. Act now to create a safer, healthier, and more prosperous UK.
attributes.background: We urge the UK government to legalise cannabis by 2025 for medicinal and recreational use (ages 18+), including cultivation, production, and sale under a robust regulatory framework.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Legalise recreational cannabis & release those convicted of cannabis offences.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707970
